About me

Hey, my name is Edmond from Sofia, Bulgaria and I'm a passionate Front-end Web Developer.

I'm trying to achieve perfection in my coding skills, as well as making user friendly interfaces for a better UX on the Web applications I'm working on.

This web site is an experimental project made with my own SASS Pattern Library. You can check it out and download it from my github profile


I love making beautiful designs come "alive" on the Web!
